item.title: Error with anti-mass
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Replace this:

if(sameclick == 5) sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]"); if(sameclick == 6) sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]"); if(sameclick == 7){ sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK![10/10]"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player : "+playerName+" was massing RAIDSCAPE_SERVER kicking "+playerName; disconnected = true;}

With This:

if(sameclick == 5) { sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]"); } if(sameclick == 6) { sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]"); } if(sameclick == 7) { sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK![10/10]"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player : "+playerName+" was massing RAIDSCAPE_SERVER kicking "+playerName; disconnected = true; }

hippie:

JIMB, he wouldnt need to use brackets untill sameclick == 7

That would be the way i use, i don’t keep things next to eachother without their starting brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: Error with anti-mass
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

Im adding a anti-mass into my server and i just cant seem to get it to work
Error:

client.java:16: illegal start of type if(sameclick == 5) ^ client.java:17: <identifier> expected sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]"); ^ client.java:18: illegal start of type if(sameclick == 6) ^ client.java:19: <identifier> expected sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]"); ^ client.java:20: illegal start of type if(sameclick == 7){ ^ client.java:39: <identifier> expected public int logcount = 0; ^ 6 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Code:

if(sameclick == 5) sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]"); if(sameclick == 6) sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]"); if(sameclick == 7){ sendMessage("STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK![10/10]"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player : "+playerName+" was massing RAIDSCAPE_SERVER kicking "+playerName; disconnected = true;}

theres more but that seems to be problem

Read full topic
